message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I'm getting a bit concerned that the product might not be worth that much.
I understand your concerns, Bob, but I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $9000.
I'm still not convinced it's worth that much.
I understand you're still hesitant, Bob. I'm willing to make a small concession. I'll sell the product to you for $8700.
I'm getting close to a deal, but I still think it's a bit pricey.
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob. I'll meet you halfway again. I'll sell the product to you for $8500.
